Title: Informing the Cataclysmic Variable Sequence from Gaia Data: 
       The Orbital Period-Color-Absolute-Magnitude Relationship 
Authors: Abrahams E.S., Bloom J.S., Szkody P., Rix H.-W., Mowlavi N. 
Table: CVs from VSX with a Robust Gaia Crossmatch
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: apjac87abt1_mrt.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units Label  Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1- 19 I19    ---   EDR3   Gaia EDR3 source identifier
  21- 39 I19    ---   DR2    Gaia DR2 source identifier
  41- 69 A29    ---   VSX    VSX catalog identifier
  71- 76 F6.4   h     Porb   Orbital period
  78- 84 F7.4   mag   Gmag   Gaia EDR3 G band magnitude
  86- 93 F8.5   mag   Color  Gaia EDR3 (BP-RP) color
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
